author: aeberbac
msg: added author and copyrights everywhere. put in the log formatter for ... formatting the logs. This is a simple class so that I'm not using System.outs in the command line apps but also so that the messages aren't the standard mega-verbose JUL messages. Also moved wsdlmerge up a folder. Moved some common methods into abstractcommandlineapp
